TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HtmlTableCell extends System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl

summary.span: 代表 物件中的 和 HTML 項目。

span.span: Represents the and HTML elements in an object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ``項目代表資料格在資料表中，雖然``項目代表表格的標題儲存格。The `` element represents a data cell in a table, while the `` element represents a table heading cell. 使用類別來以程式設計方式控制``並``中的 HTML 元素物件。Use the class to programmatically control the `` and `` HTML elements in an object. 類別可讓您指定的背景色彩、 框線色彩、 高度和寬度，以自訂資料表中的資料格的外觀。The class allows you to customize the appearance of a cell in a table by specifying the background color, the border color, the height, and the width. 這些屬性會設定使用， ， ，和屬性。These attributes are set using the , , , and properties. 您可以控制顯示方式指定內容的垂直和水平對齊儲存格內容。You can control how the content of a cell is displayed by specifying the vertical and horizontal alignment of the contents. 您也可以指定是否內容會自動繼續執行下一行到達儲存格的結束。You can also specify whether the content automatically continues on the next line when the end of the cell is reached. 水平對齊方式會受到屬性，而屬性控制的垂直對齊方式。The horizontal alignment is controlled by the property, while the property controls the vertical alignment. 屬性會指出是否要停用文字換行。The property indicates whether text wrapping is disabled. 藉由使用或屬性，您可以控制的資料行或資料格所佔用的資料列數目。By using the or the property, you can control the number of columns or rows that a cell occupies. 例如，您可以在其中建立佔用資料表中的兩個資料行，藉由設定儲存格中屬性設`2`。For example, you can create a cell that occupies two columns in a table by setting the property to `2`. 如需執行個體的初始屬性值的清單，請參閱建構函式。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. > [!CAUTION] > 此控制項可用來顯示使用者輸入，其中可能包含惡意的用戶端指令碼。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 檢查從用戶端可執行的指令碼、 SQL 陳述式，或其他程式碼傳送之前顯示在您的應用程式中的任何資訊。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. ASP.NET 提供使用者輸入來封鎖指令碼和 HTML 的輸入的要求驗證功能。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 驗證伺服器控制項也會提供以評估使用者輸入。Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 驗證伺服器控制項語法](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133)。For more information, see [Validation Server Control Syntax](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用來修改資料表中的資料格的內容。The following code example demonstrates how to use an to modify the contents of a cell in a table. 請注意，的集合控制項包含的資料列集合 (物件) 資料表中。Note that the collection of an control contains a collection of the rows ( objects) in the table. 的集合物件會儲存格的集合 (物件) 的資料列中。The collection of an object is a collection of the cells ( objects) in a row. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTblCell#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTblCell/CS/htmltablecellcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTblCell#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTblCell/VB/htmltablecellvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式來建立和初始化的新執行個體類別。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class. 這個建構函式用來建立物件，表示``資料表資料格的項目。This constructor is used to create an object that represents the `` element for a table data cell. 下表顯示的執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of . |屬性Property|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||"D"常值字串。The "td" literal string.| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立的執行個體用來控制控制，並將資料表放在網頁上。The following code example demonstrates how to create an instance of an control with controls and place the table on the Web page. 請注意如何控制項的預設建構函式用來建立``項目，而其多載建構函式採用字串參數用來建立與常值字串"th"``項目。Note how the control's default constructor is used to create a `` element, while its overloaded constructor that takes a string parameter is used with the literal string "th" to create a `` element. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTableCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableCtor/CS/htmltablectorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTableCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableCtor/VB/htmltablectorvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, using the specified tag name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式來建立和初始化的新執行個體類別。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class. 它可讓您建立物件，表示中的資料格控制項。It allows you to create an object that represents a cell in an control. 它通常用來建立物件，表示``表格標題儲存格的項目。It is commonly used to create an object that represents a `` element for a table heading cell. 雖然您可以使用這個建構函式來建立``元素的資料表資料格中，您通常會使用預設建構函式。Although you can use this constructor to create a `` element for a table data cell, you typically use the default constructor. > [!NOTE] > 這個建構函式可讓您指定資料格元素來建立，雖然``項目是唯一支援的儲存格的項目。Although this constructor allows you to specify the cell element to create, the `` element is the only supported cell element. 未來的相容性，這個建構函式可讓您建立無法供其他 HTML 資料格元素。For future compatibility, this constructor allows you to create other HTML cell elements that could become available. 下表顯示的執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of . |屬性Property|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`tagName` 參數的值。The value of the `tagName` parameter.| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立的執行個體用來控制控制，並將資料表放在網頁上。The following code example demonstrates how to create an instance of an control with controls and place the table on the Web page. 請注意如何控制項的預設建構函式用來建立``項目，而其多載建構函式採用字串參數，來為常值"th"建立``項目。Note how the control's default constructor is used to create a `` element, while its overloaded constructor that takes a string parameter is used with the literal "th" to create a `` element. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTableCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableCtor/CS/htmltablectorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTableCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableCtor/VB/htmltablectorvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Align { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Align : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定由 類別其執行個體表示的儲存格內容的水平對齊方式。

span.span: Gets or sets the horizontal alignment of the content in the cell represented by an instance of the class.

value.span: 以 的執行個體所表示儲存格內容的水平對齊方式。

span.span: The horizontal alignment of the content in the cell represented by an instance of .

value.span: 預設值為 ，表示這個屬性未設定。

span.span: The default value is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，以指定的執行個體所表示儲存格內容的水平對齊類別。Use the property to specify the horizontal alignment of the content in a cell represented by an instance of the class. > [!NOTE] > 設定這個屬性會影響執行個體所代表的資料格類別。Setting this property affects only the cell represented by an instance of the class. 若要在資料表中的整個資料列的儲存格套用相同的對齊方式，設定屬性的執行個體所表示之資料列的類別。To apply the same alignment to the cells of an entire row in the table, set the property of the row represented by an instance of the class. 下表列出可以使用這個屬性的值。The following table lists the values that can be used for this property. |值Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| |`Left`|對齊儲存格的左邊緣與資料格的內容。Aligns the contents of a cell with the left edge of the cell.| |`Center`|對齊儲存格的中間資料格的內容。Aligns the contents of a cell in the middle of the cell.| |`Right`|對齊儲存格的右邊緣與資料格的內容。Aligns the contents of a cell with the right edge of the cell.| > [!NOTE] > 您也可以使用`Justify`和`Char`做為此屬性的值; 不過，並非所有瀏覽器支援這些功能。You can also use `Justify` and `Char` as values for this property; however, not all browsers support these features. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，以程式設計方式控制中的資料格內容的對齊方式控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically control the alignment of the contents of the cells in an control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTblCellBehavior#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTblCellBehavior/CS/htmltablecellbehaviorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTblCellBehavior#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTblCellBehavior/VB/htmltablecellbehaviorvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ BgColor { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.BgColor : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定由 類別其執行個體所表示儲存格的背景色彩。

span.span: Gets or sets the background color of the cell represented by an instance of the class.

value.span: 以 的執行個體所表示儲存格的背景色彩。

span.span: The background color of the cell represented by an instance of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，以指定的執行個體所表示儲存格的背景色彩類別。Use the property to specify the background color of the cell represented by an instance of the class. 您可以指定的色彩，依名稱或使用十六進位值，加上井字號字元 （#），在表單 #RRGGBB。You can specify a color either by name or by using a hexadecimal value, preceded by the pound character (#), in the form #RRGGBB. RR、 GG 和 BB 表示十六進位值從 0 到 255，分別表示色彩的紅色、 綠色和藍色元件。RR, GG, and BB represent hexadecimal values from 0 to 255 that indicate the red, green, and blue components of a color, respectively. 例如，#0000FF 值代表藍色的色彩。For example, the value #0000FF represents the color blue. 它的最小值 (從 00) 紅色和綠色元件，而指定的藍色元件中指定的最大值 (FF)。It specifies the minimum value (00) for the red and green components, while specifying the maximum value (FF) for the blue component. 下表顯示包含十六個預先定義的 HTML 色彩名稱和對應的十六進位值，可用於屬性。The following table shows the sixteen predefined HTML color names and corresponding hexadecimal values that can be used for the property. 如需有關 HTML 色彩的詳細資訊，請參閱[World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 網站](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)。For more information on HTML colors, see the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125). |色彩的名稱Color name|十六進位值Hexadecimal value| |----------------|-----------------------| |青色Aqua|#00FFFF#00FFFF| |黑色Black|#000000#000000| |藍色Blue|#0000FF#0000FF| |桃紅Fuchsia|#FF00FF#FF00FF| |灰色Gray|#808080#808080| |綠色Green|#008000#008000| |淺綠色Lime|#00FF00#00FF00| |暗紅色Maroon|#800000#800000| |海軍Navy|#000080#000080| |橄欖色Olive|#808000#808000| |紫色Purple|#800080#800080| |紅色Red|#FF0000#FF0000| |銀級Silver|#C0C0C0#C0C0C0| |藍綠色Teal|#008080#008080| |白皮書White|#FFFFFF#FFFFFF| |黃色Yellow|#FFFF00#FFFF00| 可用的色彩，以搭配屬性可以決定從列舉型別。The available colors for use with the property can be determined from the enumeration. 色彩名稱不區分大小寫。Color names are case-insensitive. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，以程式設計方式控制中的資料格的背景色彩控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically control the background color of the cells in an control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTblCellAppearance#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTblCellAppearance/CS/htmltablecellappearancecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTblCellAppearance#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTblCellAppearance/VB/htmltablecellappearancevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定由 類別其執行個體所表示儲存格的框線色彩。

span.span: Gets or sets the border color of the cell represented by an instance of the class.

value.span: 以 的執行個體所表示儲存格的框線色彩。

span.span: The border color of the cell represented by an instance of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，以指定的執行個體所表示儲存格的框線色彩類別。Use the property to specify the border color of the cell represented by an instance of the class. 您可以指定的色彩，依名稱或使用十六進位值，加上井字號字元 （#），在表單 #RRGGBB。You can specify a color either by name or by using a hexadecimal value, preceded by the pound character (#), in the form #RRGGBB. RR、 GG 和 BB 表示十六進位值從 0 到 255，分別表示色彩的紅色、 綠色和藍色元件。RR, GG, and BB represent hexadecimal values from 0 to 255 that indicate the red, green, and blue components of a color, respectively. 例如，#0000FF 值代表藍色的色彩。For example, the value #0000FF represents the color blue. 它的最小值 (從 00) 紅色和綠色元件，而指定的藍色元件中指定的最大值 (FF)。It specifies the minimum value (00) for the red and green components, while specifying the maximum value (FF) for the blue component. 下表顯示包含十六個預先定義的 HTML 色彩名稱和對應的十六進位值，可用於屬性。The following table shows the sixteen predefined HTML color names and corresponding hexadecimal values that can be used for the property. 如需有關 HTML 色彩的詳細資訊，請參閱[World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 網站](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)站台。For more information on HTML colors, see the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125) site. |色彩的名稱Color name|十六進位值Hexadecimal value| |----------------|-----------------------| |青色Aqua|#00FFFF#00FFFF| |黑色Black|#000000#000000| |藍色Blue|#0000FF#0000FF| |桃紅Fuchsia|#FF00FF#FF00FF| |灰色Gray|#808080#808080| |綠色Green|#008000#008000| |淺綠色Lime|#00FF00#00FF00| |暗紅色Maroon|#800000#800000| |海軍Navy|#000080#000080| |橄欖色Olive|#808000#808000| |紫色Purple|#800080#800080| |紅色Red|#FF0000#FF0000| |銀級Silver|#C0C0C0#C0C0C0| |藍綠色Teal|#008080#008080| |白皮書White|#FFFFFF#FFFFFF| |黃色Yellow|#FFFF00#FFFF00| 可用的色彩，以搭配屬性可以決定從列舉型別。The available colors for use with the property can be determined from the enumeration. 色彩名稱不區分大小寫。Color names are case-insensitive. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，以程式設計方式控制中的資料格的框線色彩控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically control the border color of the cells in an control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTblCellAppearance#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTblCellAppearance/CS/htmltablecellappearancecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTblCellAppearance#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTblCellAppearance/VB/htmltablecellappearancevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int ColSpan { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.ColSpan : int with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定由 類別其執行個體所表示儲存格的欄位數目。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of columns occupied by a cell represented by an instance of the class.

value.span: 以 的執行個體所表示儲存格的行數。

span.span: The number of columns occupied by the cell represented by an instance of .

value.span: 預設值為 ，表示這個屬性未設定。

span.span: The default value is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 執行個體所表示儲存格中類別中，使用屬性來指定儲存格所佔用的資料行數目。In a cell represented by an instance of the class, use the property to specify the number of columns the cell occupies. 這可讓您建立的儲存格佔用多個資料行的資料表中。This allows you to create a cell in the table that occupies more than one column. 例如，假設您有包含兩個資料行和兩個資料列的資料表。For example, suppose you have a table that contains two columns and two rows. 您可以建立跨越兩個資料行的資料表標題儲存格。You can create a table heading cell that spans both columns. 設定第一個資料列中最左邊的資料格的屬性`2`來指示此資料格會佔用資料表中的兩個資料行。Set the property of the leftmost cell in the first row to `2` to indicate that this cell takes up two columns in the table. > [!CAUTION] > 擴展資料行，請務必定義您要展開每個資料行的資料列中的一個較少的資料格。When spanning columns, be sure to define one fewer cell in the row for each column that you span. 比方說，如果您跨越兩個資料行時，定義一個較少的資料格目前的資料列中。For example, if you span two columns, define one fewer cell in the current row. 否則，該資料列會超過資料表中的資料行數目，並如預期般運作，不會顯示資料表。Otherwise, that row will be longer than the number of columns in the table and the table will not be displayed as expected. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用以指定的屬性中的第一個資料列的資料格控制項都會佔用兩個資料行。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify that the cell in the first row of the control takes up two columns. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTblCellColSpan#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTblCellColSpan/CS/htmltablecellcolspancs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTblCellColSpan#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTblCellColSpan/VB/htmltablecellcolspanvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定由 類別其執行個體所表示儲存格的高度 (以像素為單位)。

span.span: Gets or sets the height (in pixels) of the cell represented by an instance of the class.

value.span: 以 的執行個體所表示儲存格的高度 (以像素為單位)。

span.span: The height (in pixels) of the cell represented by an instance of .

value.span: 預設值為 ，表示這個屬性未設定。

span.span: The default value is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，以指定的執行個體所表示儲存格的高度 （以像素為單位）類別。Use the property to specify the height (in pixels) of the cell represented by an instance of the class. 當您指定的資料格的高度時，相同的資料列中的所有資料格會自動共用該高度。When you specify the height of a cell, all cells in the same row automatically share that height. > [!NOTE] > 如果您指定的高度都是較小，所顯示的儲存格內容時，會忽略這個屬性。If you specify a height that is smaller than is required to display the contents of the cell, this property is ignored. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，以程式設計方式控制中的資料格的高度控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically control the height of the cells in the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTblCellAppearance#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTblCellAppearance/CS/htmltablecellappearancecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTblCellAppearance#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTblCellAppearance/VB/htmltablecellappearancevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool NoWrap { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出由 類別其執行個體所表示儲存格的文字到達儲存格的尾端時，是否要自動換行至下一行。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the text in a cell represented by an instance of the class automatically continues on the next line when it reaches the end of the cell.

value.span: 如果文字不會在儲存格中自動換行，便為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the text does not automatically wrap in the cell; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定，或決定是否在資料格中的文字表示的執行個體所類別會自動繼續在下一行時儲存格的結束。Use the property to specify or determine whether the text in a cell represented by an instance of the class automatically continues on the next line when it reaches the end of the cell. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，以程式設計方式控制中儲存格的文字是否換行控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically control whether the text wraps in the cells of an control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTblCellBehavior#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTblCellBehavior/CS/htmltablecellbehaviorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTblCellBehavior#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTblCellBehavior/VB/htmltablecellbehaviorvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void RenderEndTag(class System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub RenderEndTag (writer As HtmlTextWriter)

span.span: The that receives the rendered content.

summary.span: 轉譯 控制項的結束標記。

span.span: Renders the control's end tag.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會提供其他格式之後呼叫基底類別的方法。The method provides additional formatting after calling the base class's method. 其他格式設定可讓控制項的呈現 HTML 結尾標記之後新增一行傳回讀取的工作變得更容易。The additional formatting makes the control's rendered HTML easier to read by adding a line return after the closing tag. 方法主要由控制項開發人員擴充功能的控制項。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int RowSpan { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.RowSpan : int with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定由 類別其執行個體所表示儲存格的使用列數。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of rows occupied by a cell represented by an instance of the class.

value.span: 由 類別其執行個體所表示儲存格的使用列數。

span.span: The number of rows occupied by a cell represented by an instance of the class.

value.span: 預設值為 ，表示這個屬性未設定。

span.span: The default value is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 執行個體所表示儲存格中類別中，使用屬性，以指定的儲存格所佔用的資料列數目。In a cell represented by an instance of the class, use the property to specify the number of rows the cell occupies. 這可讓您建立的儲存格佔用多個資料列的資料表中。This allows you to create a cell in the table that occupies more than one row. 例如，假設您有包含兩個資料行和兩個資料列的資料表。For example, suppose you have a table that contains two columns and two rows. 您可以建立重疊兩個資料列的資料行。You can create a column that overlaps both rows. 設定屬性中的第一個資料行的最左邊儲存格`2`來指示此資料格會佔用資料表中的兩個資料列。Set the property of the leftmost cell in the first column to `2` to indicate that this cell takes up two rows in the table. > [!CAUTION] > 擴展資料列，請務必在您要展開每個資料列的資料行定義一個較少的資料格。When spanning rows, be sure to define one fewer cell in the column for each row that you span. 比方說，如果您跨越兩個資料列，該資料行中定義一個較少的資料格。For example, if you span two rows, define one fewer cell in that column. 否則，該資料行將會是超過資料表中的資料列數目，並如預期般運作，不會顯示資料表。Otherwise, that column will be longer than the number of rows in the table and the table will not be displayed as expected. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用以指定的屬性中的第一個資料行的資料格控制項跨越兩個資料列。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify that the cell in the first column of the control spans two rows. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTblCellRowSpan#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTblCellRowSpan/CS/htmltablecellrowspancs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTblCellRowSpan#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTblCellRowSpan/VB/htmltablecellrowspanvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定由 類別其執行個體所表示儲存格內容的垂直對齊方式。

span.span: Gets or sets the vertical alignment for the content of a cell represented by an instance of the class.

value.span: 以 的執行個體所表示儲存格內容的垂直對齊方式。

span.span: The vertical alignment for the content of a cell represented by an instance of .

value.span: 預設值為 ，表示這個屬性未設定。

span.span: The default value is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，以指定的執行個體所表示儲存格內容的垂直對齊類別。Use the property to specify the vertical alignment of the content in a cell represented by an instance of the class. > [!NOTE] > 設定這個屬性會影響執行個體所代表的資料格類別。Setting this property affects only the cell represented by an instance of the class. 若要在資料表中的整個資料列的儲存格套用相同的垂直對齊方式，設定屬性的執行個體所表示之資料列的類別。To apply the same vertical alignment to the cells of an entire row in the table, set the property of the row represented by an instance of the class. 下表列出可以使用這個屬性的值。The following table lists the values that can be used for this property. |值Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| |`Top`|對齊儲存格的上邊緣與資料格的內容。Aligns the contents of a cell with the upper edge of the cell.| |`Middle`|對齊儲存格的中央儲存格的內容。Aligns the contents of a cell in the center of the cell.| |`Bottom`|對齊儲存格的下邊緣與資料格的內容。Aligns the contents of a cell with the lower edge of the cell.| > [!NOTE] > 您也可以使用`BaseLine`做為這個屬性的值。You can also use `BaseLine` as a value for this property. 不過，並非所有的瀏覽器都支援這項功能。However, not all browsers support this feature. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，以程式設計方式控制中的資料格內容的垂直對齊控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically control the vertical alignment of the contents of the cells in an control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTblCellBehavior#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTblCellBehavior/CS/htmltablecellbehaviorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTblCellBehavior#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTblCellBehavior/VB/htmltablecellbehaviorvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定由 類別其執行個體所表示儲存格的寬度 (以像素為單位)。

span.span: Gets or sets the width (in pixels) of the cell represented by an instance of the class.

value.span: 以 的執行個體所表示儲存格的寬度 (以像素為單位)。

span.span: The width (in pixels) of the cell represented by an instance of .

value.span: 預設值為 ，表示這個屬性未設定。

span.span: The default value is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，以指定的執行個體所表示儲存格的寬度 （以像素為單位）類別。Use the property to specify the width (in pixels) of the cell represented by an instance of the class. 當您指定資料格的寬度時，相同的資料行中的所有資料格就會自動共用該寬度。When you specify the width for a cell, all cells in the same column automatically share that width. > [!NOTE] > 如果您指定較小，所顯示的儲存格內容的寬度，則會忽略這個屬性。If you specify a width that is smaller than is required to display the contents of the cell, this property is ignored. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，以程式設計方式控制中的資料格的寬度控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically control the width of the cells in the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTblCellAppearance#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTblCellAppearance/CS/htmltablecellappearancecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTblCellAppearance#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTblCellAppearance/VB/htmltablecellappearancevb.aspx#1)]
